DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety Methacholine Chloride challenge test diagnosis adult asthma
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Methacholine Chloride Challenge Test Diagnosis Adult Asthma
DOC.criteria: FEV1/forced vital capacity ( FVC ) must 70 % < 10 % decrease FEV1 response inhalation normal saline Moderate airflow limitation ( FEV1 < 60 % predict < 1.5 L ) Heart attack stroke last 3 month Uncontrolled hypertension , systolic BP > 200 , diastolic BP > 100
